function grantPermission(address target, uint8 permissionType, uint256 expiresAt) external
function revokePermission(address target, string memory reason) external
function checkPermission(address user, address target) external view returns (bool)
function checkPermissionRisk(address user, address target) external view returns (bool allowed, uint8 riskScore)
function autoRevokeIfHighRisk(address user, address target) external
function getUserPermissions(address user) external view returns (address[] memory)

function getPermission(address user, address target) external view returns (tuple(address user, address target, uint8 permissionType, bool isActive, uint256 grantedAt, uint256 expiresAt, bytes32 patternHash))
function cleanupExpiredPermission(address user, address target) external
event PermissionGranted(address indexed user, address indexed target, uint8 permissionType, bytes32 indexed permissionHash, uint256 expiresAt)
event PermissionRevoked(address indexed user, address indexed target, bytes32 indexed permissionHash, string reason)
event PermissionRiskChecked(address indexed user, address indexed target, uint8 riskScore, bool allowed)
